title: What's this font??
content:
I need some help ID'ing a font; It's similar to Brush Script MT, but just different enough that I can't use that font.

It's the red/brown line of text under My Coffee.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818202812im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMAGE_745_3934.jpg)

Thanks,  
R//R
author: rampageraptor
